page.title: 13TOURISM_PLACES TO VISIT
page.content: TOURISM_Here is a list of places around Perranporth you might like to visit if you are on holiday World In Miniature,Goonhavern.This shows models of famous buildings around the world.One is the Leaning Tower Of Pisa. Bolingey. This is an attractive village with a pottery.There is a mill at Nansmellyn.There is a fishing lake. John Opies Cottage,near Mithian. This is the birthplace of the most famous Cornish painter.Visit by appointment only. Piran Round.This is a natural ampi- theatre which was once used for medieval miracle plays.In September the Cornish gorsedd will be held there. The Oratory.It marks the place of St Pirans first church.
